capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry has red hair, and I can confirm that's true.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never met anyone with naturally red hair before, tell me more about it!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Harry's hair is looking a bit fiery today, and I have to say, it suits him. He does look a bit flushed, though - that red hair can make people look even redder when they're feeling warm.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry and he's definitely wearing glasses. I'm quite certain about it, actually. He looked pretty confident in them too, which makes sense since they're really good for his eyesight.
